subject: JUnit Test Administration
msgSnippet: Good evening! I m searching a system for administrating my JUnit tests on a server. I am developing a Framework on my local machine and commit it to a
messageBody:
Good evening!

I'm searching a system for administrating my JUnit tests on a server.

I am developing a Framework on my local machine and commit it to a
subversion repository on a server.

I have some JUnit tests written for it. In the past I used junittca to
administrade the tests. But I like to use a Database for it, hosted on
the same server subversion runs on.

This system should give me the possibilities of:
- planing and sheduling tests
- working with the java test runner (JTR)
- working with ant
- presenting the generated JUnit test reports

Do you know such a system? What system requirements do I need on the
server?

Thanks in advance!
Daniel
